title: GOVENDOR15EXPERIMENT "internal" package issue
body:
So basically the problem is as follows: if you have any package vendored that has a sub-package "internal" compiling/running/testing result in an error, that states that package name "internal" could not be used. That breaks compatibility with the libraries that have such a package-name.

An example of such library would be https://github.com/garyburd/redigo .

The go version is 1.5.2.
